title: What is the hulu logo font.
content: Does any one know the [www.hulu.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419071157/http:/www.hulu.com/ "www.hulu.com") logo font?
author: jfldesign

comments.content: I would guess it's custom. It would be every easy to build from scratch.
Yea I thought the same thing but was just wondering.

The Hulu font is actually called Futura Bold. Test it out and download it it here.  
 [http://social-fonts.com/hulu/futura-bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419071157/http:/social-fonts.com/hulu/futura-bold/)

Font used: Futura MDd BT

Source: [http://www.hongkiat.com/blog/fonts-used-logos-popular-brands/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419071157/http:/www.hongkiat.com/blog/fonts-used-logos-popular-brands/ "http://www.hongkiat.com/blog/fonts-used-logos-popular-brands/")
